articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.title: Honor launches the world’s thinnest foldable in Europe - The Verge
articles.description: The Honor Magic V5 is going on sale in Europe alongside the MagicPad 3 tablet and MagicBook Art 14 laptop.
articles.content: The Magic V5 arrives alongside a new tablet and laptop. The Magic V5 arrives alongside a new tablet and laptop. Honor is bringing the Magic V5 the worlds thinn… [+3341 chars]
